languages.text: "Благодарю вас, Ваша Светлость, но после завершения боев я все же начну масштабную проверку среди оборонных сил. Мы потеряли слишком многое — я хочу быть уверена, что дело в проклятом превосходстве соперника, а не предателях среди нас!"

"Thank you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but once the battles have concluded, I would still like to launch a large-scale inspection in the Defence Forces. Our losses are too great — I want to make sure that this is all due to our accursed enemy's superior numbers, not traitors in our midst!"
languages.original_text: "Благодарю вас, Ваша Светлость, но после завершения боев я все же начну масштабную проверку среди оборонных сил. Мы потеряли слишком многое — я хочу быть уверена, что дело в проклятом превосходстве соперника, а не предателях среди нас!"

traits.locale_text: "Thank you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but once the battles have concluded, I would still like to launch a large-scale inspection in the Defense Forces. We've lost too much — I want to make sure that this is all due to our accursed enemy's superior numbers, not traitors in our midst!"

"Thank you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but once the battles have concluded, I would still like to launch a large-scale inspection in the Defense Forces. We've lost too much — I want to make sure that this is all due to our accursed enemy's superior numbers, not traitors in our midst!"

"Thank you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but once the battles have concluded, I would still like to launch a large-scale inspection in the Defence Forces. Our losses are too great — I want to make sure that this is all due to our accursed enemy's superior numbers, not traitors in our midst!"

"Thank you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but once the battles have concluded, I would still like to launch a large-scale inspection in the Defence Forces. Our losses are too great — I want to make sure that this is all due to our accursed enemy's superior numbers, not traitors in our midst!"

"Thank you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but once the battles have concluded, I would still like to launch a large-scale inspection in the Defence Forces. Our losses are too great — I want to make sure that this is all due to our accursed enemy's superior numbers, not traitors in our midst!"

languages.text: 「ありがとうございます、陛下。しかし戦いが収束したら、防衛軍の大規模な検証を実施したく存じます。この度の損失はあまりにも大きい―今回の敗因は内部の裏切り者ではなく、敵軍の多さによるものであることを確実なものにしたいのです！」
languages.original_text: "Thank you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but once the battles have concluded, I would still like to launch a large-scale inspection in the Defence Forces. Our losses are too great — I want to make sure that this is all due to our accursed enemy's superior numbers, not traitors in our midst!"

traits.locale_text: 「ありがとうございます、陛下。しかし戦いが収束したら、防衛軍の大規模な検証を実施したく存じます。この度の損失はあまりにも大きい―今回の敗因は内部の裏切り者ではなく、敵軍の多さによるものであることを確実なものにしたいのです！」

languages.text: “谢谢您，大人。不过，等所有战斗结束之后，我打算对行星防御部队进行一次大规模的审查。这场突袭让我们损失惨重，我必须确保这样的结果是缘于敌我力量悬殊，而不是因为我们内部出了叛徒！”
languages.original_text: "Thank you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but once the battles have concluded, I would still like to launch a large-scale inspection in the Defence Forces. Our losses are too great — I want to make sure that this is all due to our accursed enemy's superior numbers, not traitors in our midst!"

traits.locale_text: “谢谢您，大人。不过，等所有战斗结束之后，我打算对行星防御部队进行一次大规模的审查。这场突袭让我们损失惨重，我必须确保这样的结果是缘于敌我力量悬殊，而不是因为我们内部出了叛徒！”

languages.text: «Gracias, mi{mf|lord|lady}, pero cuando terminen los combates sigo queriendo lanzar una inspección a gran escala en las Fuerzas de Defensa. Nuestras bajas son terribles, ¡y quiero asegurarme de que se deben a la superioridad numérica de los malditos xenos y no a la presencia de traidores entre nosotros!».
languages.original_text: "Thank you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but once the battles have concluded, I would still like to launch a large-scale inspection in the Defence Forces. Our losses are too great — I want to make sure that this is all due to our accursed enemy's superior numbers, not traitors in our midst!"

traits.locale_text: «Gracias, mi{mf|lord|lady}, pero cuando terminen los combates sigo queriendo lanzar una inspección a gran escala en las Fuerzas de Defensa. Nuestras bajas son terribles, ¡y quiero asegurarme de que se deben a la superioridad numérica de los malditos xenos y no a la presencia de traidores entre nosotros!».

languages.text: « Merci, Votre Seigneurie, mais une fois la bataille terminée, j'aimerais soumettre l'ensemble des Forces de Défense à une inspection. Nos pertes sont trop importantes, je veux m'assurer qu'elles sont uniquement dues à la supériorité numérique de nos adversaires, et pas à des traîtres ! »
languages.original_text: "Thank you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but once the battles have concluded, I would still like to launch a large-scale inspection in the Defence Forces. Our losses are too great — I want to make sure that this is all due to our accursed enemy's superior numbers, not traitors in our midst!"

traits.locale_text: « Merci, Votre Seigneurie, mais une fois la bataille terminée, j'aimerais soumettre l'ensemble des Forces de Défense à une inspection. Nos pertes sont trop importantes, je veux m'assurer qu'elles sont uniquement dues à la supériorité numérique de nos adversaires, et pas à des traîtres ! »

languages.text: "Danke, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, aber ich möchte dennoch nach dem Ende der Kämpfe eine große Untersuchung der Verteidigungsstreitkräfte durchführen. Unsere Verluste sind zu groß – ich will sichergehen, dass die Übermacht des verfluchten Feindes dafür verantwortlich ist und nicht etwa Verräter in unserer Mitte!"
languages.original_text: "Thank you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but once the battles have concluded, I would still like to launch a large-scale inspection in the Defence Forces. Our losses are too great — I want to make sure that this is all due to our accursed enemy's superior numbers, not traitors in our midst!"

traits.locale_text: "Danke, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, aber ich möchte dennoch nach dem Ende der Kämpfe eine große Untersuchung der Verteidigungsstreitkräfte durchführen. Unsere Verluste sind zu groß – ich will sichergehen, dass die Übermacht des verfluchten Feindes dafür verantwortlich ist und nicht etwa Verräter in unserer Mitte!"

languages.text: "Teşekkürler {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Ancak muharebeler sona erdiğinde Savunma Kuvvetleri bünyesinde geniş çaplı bir soruşturma yürütmek isterim. Kayıplarımız beklentimizi aşıyor. Bu durumun aramızdaki hainlerden değil, düşman sayısının fazlalığından kaynaklandığını teyit etmek gerek!"
languages.original_text: "Thank you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but once the battles have concluded, I would still like to launch a large-scale inspection in the Defence Forces. Our losses are too great — I want to make sure that this is all due to our accursed enemy's superior numbers, not traitors in our midst!"

traits.locale_text: "Teşekkürler {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Ancak muharebeler sona erdiğinde Savunma Kuvvetleri bünyesinde geniş çaplı bir soruşturma yürütmek isterim. Kayıplarımız beklentimizi aşıyor. Bu durumun aramızdaki hainlerden değil, düşman sayısının fazlalığından kaynaklandığını teyit etmek gerek!"
